element.definition: Indicates the site on the subject's body where the observation was made (i.e. the target site).
element.comment: Only used if not implicit in code found in Observation.code.  In many systems, this may be represented as a related observation instead of an inline component.   If the use case requires BodySite to be handled as a separate resource (e.g. to identify and track separately) then use the standard extension[ body-site-instance](extension-body-site-instance.html).

binding.description: Codes describing anatomical locations. May include laterality.
